name: There Be Dragons
tagline: Arising out of the horror of the Spanish Civil War, a candidate for canonization is investigated by a journalist who discovers his own estranged father had a deep, dark and devastating connection to the saint's life.

name: Page One: Inside the New York Times
tagline: Unprecedented access to the New York Times newsroom yields a complex view of the transformation of a media landscape fraught with both peril and opportunity.

name: September Dawn
tagline: A love story set during a tense encounter between a wagon train of settlers and a renegade Mormon group.

name: Desi Boyz
tagline: Two friends lose their jobs, then part bitterly after they get exposed as male escorts.

name: What Maisie Knew
tagline: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.

name: The Oogieloves in the Big Balloon Adventure
tagline: The Oogieloves -- Goobie, Zoozie and Toofie -- set out to find five magical balloons that will make their good friend Schluufy's surprise birthday party extra-special.

name: The Mother
tagline: A grandmother has a passionate affair with a man half her age, who is also sleeping with her daughter.

name: A Christmas Tale
tagline: The Vuillard family is no stranger to physical/mental illness, loss, and banishment. But when the matriarch becomes in need of a transplant, the whole family is forced to come together, emotional baggage and all, just in time for Christmas.

name: Caramel
tagline: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.

name: Lolita
tagline: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

name: No Man's Land
tagline: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

name: Thanks for Sharing
tagline: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.

name: Wonderland
tagline: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.

name: Peaceful Warrior
tagline: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

name: My Wife Is an Actress
tagline: A "normal" guy who is married to a hot actress gets worried that she is involved with her costar. This worry turns into jealousy and causes problems in their relationship. This is a story about trust and a comedy about the actions between men and women.

name: The Luzhin Defence
tagline: Two worlds collide when an eccentric genius falls in love with a strong-willed society beauty.

name: Chuck & Buck
tagline: An oddly naive man-child stalks his childhood best friend and tries to reconnect with their past.

name: Joyeux Noel
tagline: On Christmas Eve during world War I, the Germans, French, and Scottish fraternize and get to know the men who live on the opposite side of a brutal war, in what became a true lesson of humanity.

name: Undiscovered
tagline: A group of aspiring entertainers try to establish careers for themselves in the city of Los Angeles.

name: Animal Kingdom
tagline: Tells the story of seventeen year-old J (Josh) as he navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

name: Velvet Goldmine
tagline: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

name: Bottle Rocket
tagline: Focusing on a trio of friends and their elaborate plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

name: Casino Jack
tagline: A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.

name: In Darkness
tagline: A dramatization of one man's rescue of Jewish refugees in the Nazi-occupied Polish city of Lvov.

name: The Celestine Prophecy
tagline: An adaptation of James Redfield's novel about the search for a sacred manuscript in the Peruvian rain forest.

name: Before the Rains
tagline: A English spice baron settles in South India during the waning years of the Raj.

name: Leonard Cohen: I'm Your Man
tagline: A documentary on the legendary singer-songwriter, with performances by those musicians he has influenced.

name: Notorious C.H.O.
tagline: A film of Margaret Cho's one-woman stand-up show, in which she presents her take on modern sexual topics and minority issues.

name: Partner
tagline: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies.

name: Kill Your Darlings
tagline: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.

name: Welcome Home
tagline: Jake died in Vietnam; his family mourned him, then moved on. When he reappears, quite alive, the question is, what must he do and how will his family respond to him?

name: The Thing Called Love
tagline: A group of newcomers to the country music business seek love and stardom.

name: A Home at the End of the World
Buried
tagline: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

name: The Business of Strangers
tagline: Two businesswomen bond and reveal their inner natures while getting carried away on a revenge attack against an accused rapist.

name: The Children of Huang Shi
tagline: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.

name: Cocktail
tagline: A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.

name: Latcho Drom
tagline: The journey of the Romany people told through musicians and dancers of India, Egypt, Turkey, Romania, Hungary, Slovakia, France, and Spain.

name: Cross My Heart
tagline: A man and a woman go out on a "big" third date. He's ashamed to admit he just lost his job, and she's afraid he'll run away if he finds out that she has a kid. Small lies lead to bigger ones and the night gets crazy very soon.

name: Another Day in Paradise
tagline: In the hope of a big score, two junkie couples team up to commit various drug robberies which go disastrously wrong leading to dissent, violence and murder.

name: Attack the Block
tagline: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

name: The Beat That My Heart Skipped
tagline: Will Thomas still lead a life of crime and cruelty, just like his thuggish father, or will he pursue his dream of becoming a pianist?

name: Skinwalkers
tagline: A 12 year old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

name: Silver City
tagline: The discovery of a corpse threatens to unravel a bumbling local politician's campaign for governor of Colorado.

name: Guzaarish
tagline: A paralyzed Magician-turned-Radio Jockey files a Petition in Court seeking permission to end his life.

name: Two Family House
tagline: A dreamer finds that his wife and friends are binding him to his mediocre existence.

name: The Son's Room
tagline: A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.

name: Stalingrad
tagline: A band of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

name: Owning Mahowny

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

tagline: A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.

name: Short Term 12
tagline: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

name: He Loves Me... He Loves Me Not
tagline: A young woman who is in love with a married doctor becomes dangerous when her attempts to persuade him to leave his wife are unsuccessful. However, when things are seen from his point of view, the real situation becomes clear.

name: Whore
tagline: This choppy melodrama investigates the life of a prostitute in a pseudo-documentary style. The bottom line of the film is that a life of a hooker isn't easy...

name: Hard Candy
tagline: A teenage girl raids a man's home, suspecting he is a pedophile, in order to expose him.

name: In a Better World
tagline: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

name: Cobb
tagline: A reporter hired to write the 'official' biography of Ty Cobb discovers just how dark the baseball legend's real story is.

name: Damsels in Distress
tagline: A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.

name: Europa
tagline: Just after WW2, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

name: Liam
tagline: A family falls into poverty during the Depression.

name: Ginger & Rosa
tagline: A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event the comes to redefine their relationship.

production.name: Ce Qui Me Meut Motion Pictures

name: Diana Vreeland: The Eye Has to Travel
tagline: A look at the life and work of the influential fashion editor of Harpers Bazaar, Diana Vreeland.

name: Fast Food Nation
tagline: An ensemble piece examining the health risks involved in the fast food industry and its environmental and social consequences as well.

name: Enemy
tagline: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

name: Strangers in Good Company
tagline: A busload of women become stranded in an isolated part of the Canadian countryside. As they await rescue, they reflect on their lives through a mostly ad-libbed script.

name: Shiloh
tagline: Marty Preston, a small-town Southern boy, must rescue a young beagle from abusive owner and recluse Judd Travers.

name: Kaante
tagline: Six bank robbers trying to pull off the perfect heist discover one of them is an undercover cop.

name: From Up on Poppy Hill
tagline: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

name: A Hard Day's Night
tagline: A 'typical' day in the life of the Beatles, including many of their famous songs.

name: Goya's Ghosts
tagline: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

name: Robot Monster
tagline: The monstrous Ro-Man attempts to annihilate the last family alive on Earth, but finds himself falling for their beautiful daughter.

name: The Killer Shrews
tagline: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Movie
tagline: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about "This Island Earth".

name: Yes, Giorgio
tagline: A famous opera singer, Giorgio Fini, loses his voice during an American tour. He goes to a female throat specialist, Pamela Taylor, whom he falls in love with.

name: The Delinquents
tagline: A frustrated young man, separated from his younger girlfriend, gets involved in a juvenile gang.
